    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>vip user</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function checkUserVIPStatus(userId) {
  var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
  userGr.addQuery('user_name', userId);
  userGr.query();

  if (userGr.next()) {
    var isVIP = userGr.getValue('vip');
    if (isVIP == 'true') {
      gs.info('User ' + userId + ' is a VIP.');
      return true;
    } else {
      gs.info('User ' + userId + ' is not a VIP.');
      return false;
    }
  } else {
    gs.info('User ' + userId + ' not found.');
    return false;
  }
}

// Example usage
var userId = 'abraham.lincoln';
var isUserVIP = checkUserVIPStatus(userId);
]]></script>
